reviewText: This was a gift for my other husband.  He's making us things from it all the time and we love the food.  Directions are simple, easy to read and interpret, and fun to make.  We all love different kinds of cuisine and Raichlen provides recipes from everywhere along the barbecue trail as he calls it. Get it and just open a page.  Have at it.  You'll love the food and it has provided us with an insight into the culture that produced it. It's all about broadening horizons.  Yum!!
My husband rarely asks for anything specific, but he really liked this show.  I was so glad I could find this for him.  He was so happy that I found it for him.
This guy knows his stuff. I love the seriously step by step approach to real food cooked right. This was so good I bought the second one as well.

THIS CAN BE FOUND AT: [...] FOR $19.99, also an issue is coming out 10/11/2011. Steven Raichlen is the master and anything that he imparts is worth it, but you don't have to pay nearly $100 for something you can get for $20. I like to support free enterprise, but that price discrepancy is a little too free.

Quite good particularly for inspiration (DVD given as a present)- excellent recipes are usually also available on his website(s).  However I much prefer several of his cookbooks,in particular: Sauces, Rubs and Marinades, along with The Barbecue! Bible and Planet Barbecue.  We grade recipes in order to keep track of what we like and don't like - I'd say literally 95% are in the A- to A+ range.  His recipes seem to be exceptionally good.  Also note they can be adapted for broiling followed by baking (I did a lot of that throughout the winter).
summary: Quite good but I *much* prefer the cookbooks

reviewText: The DVD is very useful and very detailed and makes it easy to cook the recipes.I was so impressed that I bought another DVD for my son
Have learned to use my grill for making many things and it has given me the confidence to cook for family and friends.
summary: wonderfull ideas for using your grill for more than just a burger and dog cooker

reviewText: I saw this deal and ordered it immediately. I really was looking forward to getting my metal detector in the mail. What I got was a book on CD, something about Sand Sharks. I was very, very unpleased, but I didn't argue, because what's the point? I just won't trust deals like this again very quickly. Look into everything before you purchase.
This metal detector is light and powerful. It works as advertised. Excellent product!I have used it for a few days. I am impressed!

Don't buy this machine. I have one and I don't want you to have it. That will leave more things for me to find.IT is a great detector. It works great in salt water and on the beaches. It is very deep being a pulse inductive machine.It will find all the metal that is there so figure on digging a lot if there is a lot of trash like pull tabs or bottle caps.
There are so many things you can plank. The Brie is excellent. I can't wait to try them all! So many recipes to choose from.

Last year we reviewed this cookbook on TipsforBBQ.com. It is a fantastic reference for plank grilling - in fact, i would say it is 'THE BEST' reference for planking. It is, and I'm not joking, a seriously fun read. It would even make a great coffee table book for great the food shots are.For our review we did a step by step review of the Original Planked Salmon recipe. Out of the gate I took a little liberty with the ingredients on the toppings and it was immediately a favorite. So much so that we've done the recipe again and again. For a professional BBQ Chef, that is definitely saying something. It is also worth mentioning that the rub he uses here is bottled and sold commercially.One of the reasons that I like this book so much is that i covers the entire pantheon of techniques for plank and wood grilling. There are great ideas and approaches to making your own (and much better) planks than what you can buy in the store. The Holy Plank is a great way to grill foods and the rack for skewers is great if you have the room. I've enjoyed this cookbook and my interactions with Teddy. This cookbook is one of my favorites and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to plank grill.
This little stuffed kitty was a great little backpack pull to represent the kitty in the bad kitty books. He is always misunderstood and getting blamed for things he doesn't do.

and couldn't wait to add this to his backpack (he's 8 and I came across this whilest searching for a dinosaur backpack pull which we did end up also finding/getting, but there was no way he was NOT going to get this too!)  Looks so funny/cute on his backpack - he is very pleased as am I.
summary: My 8 year old thinks Bad Kitty is hilarious

reviewText: 7 year old is obsessed with Bad Kitty.. Put on her backpack and when she went back to school all her friends wanted to know where she got it. Santa Claus, of course!
Cheaply made with cheap fabric/materials for the price.  Too bad considering it is a great character to go with the books.
Love this guys is really cute.  I love that my kiddo has something small to get him excited about a book series.
My daughter has been a fan of Bad Kitty since she learned to read and still loves him.  She "collects" backpack pulls so she was thrilled to get this for a little gift.
My grand daughter just loved this.  She put it on her backback and all the girls at school wanted one.
It's a Cute little Bad Kitty, Daughter loves it and it Hooks right on and works. What more would you want
